sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STEREOMETRY, Στεφεομετρια formed of ςερε ς ſolid, and μετρον meaſure, that part of geometry which teaches how to meaſure ſolid bodies, i. e. to find the ſolidity or ſolid contents of bodies ; as globes, cylinders, cubes, veſſels, ſhips, &c.
